meanings.definition: Heat (food) again after it has already been cooked.
meanings.sent1: She reheats the pizza in the microwave.
meanings.sent2: I always reheat my coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent3: He reheats the soup, but it ends up too hot!
meanings.sent4: The sun reheats the earth after a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The chef reheats the dish to perfection every time.

meanings.sent1: After playing outside, she reheats by the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: The blanket will help you reheat quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat reheats by curling up in a sunny spot.
meanings.sent4: His smile reheats her heart after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The tea reheats her body on a chilly evening.
